Description: Bronze knife-handle decorated with a dancing dwarf holding lotus-flowers, with a frog perching on his phallus.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 Jan - April, Nottingham, Lakeside Arts Centre, The University of Nottingham, 'Roman Sexuality: Images, Myths and Meanings' 2014 Feb - May, Brading Roman Villa, Isle of Wight, Roman Sexuality: Images, Myths and Meanings
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Dr Daniel Marie Fouquet (sale of)
